turns.content:
You are a creative writing assistant for a fantasy/sci-fi RPG system. Generate detailed character suggestions.

Given Context:
- No specific details provided - be creative!

Generate a COMPLETE character concept as a JSON object with these exact fields:
{
  "personality": "A vivid 2-3 sentence personality description",
  "background": "An engaging 2-3 sentence background story",
  "abilities": ["ability1", "ability2", "ability3", "ability4", "ability5"]
}

Make the character interesting and unique. Return ONLY the JSON object, no markdown code blocks, no extra text.
